name: Space Extra Ascended
description:
Space Extra is a 2D vertical shoot em up game. Save Earth from alien invaders and help your allies!

Features strategical boss fights after fighting off minions, a highscore for every run - can you do better the next run? Hidden placed power ups that are either falling down fast or slow. And you'll learn something new from every boss in the research lab.

  • A story set in outer space waiting for you to take part in!
  • Collect skins for your character.
  • Progress into the game and you will earn talent points to spend on the talent tree. Love grinding? The story does not end here, grind your level to get talent points.
  • Online leaderboards for your highscores inside the game.
